EnablingAuthority.XRefExternal: PUBLIC SERVICE REARRANGEMENT AND TRANSFER OF DUTIES ACT

Identification.LongTitle: Order Transferring from the Minister of State (Federal Economic Development Agency for Southern Ontario) to the Minister of Industry the Powers, Duties and Functions in Relation to the Federal Economic Development Agency for Southern Ontario

Provision.Text: Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, under paragraph 2(a)a of the Public Service Rearrangement and Transfer of Duties Actb, transfers from the Minister of State (Federal Economic Development Agency for Southern Ontario) to the Minister of Industry the powers, duties and functions of the Minister of State (Federal Economic Development Agency for Southern Ontario) in relation to the Federal Economic Development Agency for Southern Ontario.
